getEeuBatch(uint256).details: Returns an EEU batch by ID

getEeuBatchCount().details: Returns the global EEU batch count

getEeuMintedCount().details: Returns the global no. of EEUs minted

getKgCarbonMinted().details: Returns the global no. of KGs carbon minted in EEUs

getLedgerEntry(address).details: Returns the ledger entry for an account

burnEeus(address,uint8,int256).notice: burns carbons by resizing EEUs, and/or removing EEUs from the ledger. removes EEUs (or fractions thereof) from the main list and from the ledger, resizing as necessary. the supplied ledger owner must hold the supplied quantity of carbon in aggregate across ledger EEUs, and of the supplied type.
